briefdescription.para: A vector of triggers for insurance payouts based on storage-to-ROF triggers.
The percentage of revenue that is used to pay for insurance.
A vector of payout multiplier to adjust for partially paid insurance price due to insufficient contingency fund.
A vector of insurance prices for each utility as a function of fixed_payouts,revenue, and insurance premiums.
A vector of fixed payouts for each utility in case of an insurance trigger.
A vector for the updated (current year) revenues for each utility.
A vector for the prior year's revenues for each utility.
A vector of drought mitigation policies.

memberdef.argsstring: (const int id, vector< WaterSource *> &water_sources, const Graph &water_sources_graph, const vector< vector< int >> &water_sources_to_utilities, vector< Utility *> &utilities, vector< DroughtMitigationPolicy *> &drought_mitigation_policies, vector< MinEnvFlowControl *> min_env_flow_controls, vector< vector< double >> &utilities_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &water_sources_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &policy_rdm, vector< double > &rof_triggers, const double insurance_premium, const vector< double > &fixed_payouts, unsigned long total_simulation_time)
memberdef.name: InsuranceStorageToROF

briefdescription.para: Constructs an InsuranceStorageToROF object for drought insurance policies based on storage-to-ROF triggers.

parameterdescription.para: Vector of water sources used in the model.
Graph of connections between water sources.
Mapping between water sources and utilities.
Vector of utilities involved in the policy.
Vector of minimum environmental flow controls.
Random decision matrix for water sources.
Fixed payouts for each utility in case of an insurance trigger.

briefdescription.para: Creates a copy of an existing InsuranceStorageToROF object.
Destroys the InsuranceStorageToROF object and releases resources.
Calculates the insurance price based on payout probabilities.
Applies the insurance policy for a given week.

detaileddescription.para: This function runs an ROF calculation of 50 year long simulations to estimate the likelihood that payouts will occur. The price of the insurance is set as (average sum of payouts across all 50 years * insurance premium).
This function overrides the pure virtual function applyPolicy in DroughtMitigationPolicy.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< Utility *> utilities, vector< WaterSource *> water_sources, vector< MinEnvFlowControl *> min_env_flow_controls) override
memberdef.name: addSystemComponents

briefdescription.para: Adds Utility and WaterSource objects to the InsuranceStorageToROF policy.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the pure virtual function addSystemComponents in DroughtMitigationPolicy.

parameterdescription.para: Vector of minimum environmental flow controls.

memberdef.argsstring: (unsigned long realization_id, vector< double > &utilities_rdm, vector< double > &water_sources_rdm, vector< double > &policy_rdm) override
memberdef.name: setRealization

briefdescription.para: Sets the realization parameters for the InsuranceStorageToROF policy.

parameterdescription.para: DU factor multipliers for utilities' demand growth rates.
DU factor multipliers for water sources financing, construction, and permitting times.
DU factor multipliers for utilities' drought mitigation policies effectiveness.

memberdef.argsstring: (int week, const vector< Utility *> &utilities, const int &n_utilities)
memberdef.name: calculateShortTermROFTable

briefdescription.para: Runs a short-term ROF calculation for a given week.

detaileddescription.para: FIXME: Needs to be extended from the original function from ContinuityModelROF.cpp.

parameterdescription.para: The current week for which ROFs should be calculated.
Vector of utilities for the ROF calculation.

simplesect.para: A vector of calculated ROF values for each utility.

briefdescription.para: Updates the online infrastructure for the current week.

detaileddescription.para: This function overrides the pure virtual function updateOnlineInfrastructure in DroughtMitigationPolicy.

briefdescription.para: The InsuranceStorageToROF class is a subclass of the DroughtMitigationPolicy and ContinuityModelROF classes that implements drought insurance policies based on storage-to-ROF triggers.

detaileddescription.para: The InsuranceStorageToROF class is a subclass of the DroughtMitigationPolicy class that implements water use restrictions based on risk of failure (ROF) triggers.
